casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Ernest G. SILVA. No. 552P06-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 8, 2007. Robert Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, Phil Berger, District Attorney, for State of NC.

*399The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 18th day of October 2007 by Defendant for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 8th day of November 2007."
